p: All data were analysed using SPSS 13.0 (SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL, USA). Data were expressed as means ± standard deviations (SD), and analysed by a two-way ANOVA for two independent variables and by a one-way ANOVA for one variable among treatments. Least significant difference (LSD) test was used for multiple comparisons. The results were considered significant at p < 0.05 (two-sided).
